content: I'm planning a birthday dinner for my sister this weekend and I need some help with finding a good recipe for a dessert. Do you have any suggestions? By the way, I just got back from a shopping trip to the mall last weekend and got her a beautiful necklace from Tiffany's, and I also got my mom a customized photo album from Shutterfly for her anniversary, which cost around $50 and turned out really nice.
